nodes.text: Finn & the First Order is a young readers book in the World of Reading series written by Elizabeth Schaefer and published by Disney–Lucasfilm Press that adapts scenes from Star Wars: Episode VII The Force Awakens. The book, a level two title, was published on December 18, 2015, comprises 32 pages, and is intended for children ages six through eight.
Read along with Star Wars! Desperate to escape his past, Finn is plunged into adventure as he journeys down a heroic, but dangerous, path.
The book features a scene not present in the film; Finn presents his blaster to Captain Phasma and states it was broken as the reason for not firing down on Jakku.
